title: The examination of the Accidence by questions and answeres wherein the accidentes of the eight partes of speech are familiarly handled and all difficulties in the same arising explained : whereby young scholers may in shorter time learne to vnderstand, and maisters vvith more ease, and better successe teach the principles of the Accidence, then it vsually happeneth / set forth by T.C.
author: Caudry, Thomas.
publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Norton ... in Latine, Greeke, and Hebrue,
